meanings.sent1: The obnoxious smell made everyone cover their noses.
meanings.sent2: Her obnoxious behavior at the party annoyed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The obnoxious cat kept knocking things off the table for fun.
meanings.sent4: The obnoxious color of the walls clashed with the furniture.
meanings.sent5: The obnoxious sound of the alarm clock woke me up abruptly.

meanings.sent1: The obnoxious fly buzzed around our heads during the picnic.
meanings.sent2: His obnoxious habit of tapping his pen on the desk drove me crazy.
meanings.sent3: The obnoxious squirrel stole all the birdseed from the feeder.
meanings.sent4: The obnoxious dripping faucet kept me up all night.
meanings.sent5: The obnoxious mosquito bites left itchy red marks on my skin.

meanings.sent1: His obnoxious remarks hurt her feelings deeply.
meanings.sent2: The movie's obnoxious language made it unsuitable for children.
meanings.sent3: The obnoxious graffiti on the wall was surprisingly well-drawn.
meanings.sent4: The obnoxious behavior of the bullies made the school environment toxic.
meanings.sent5: The obnoxious taste of the medicine made it hard to swallow.
